mapper.select: SELECT c.cartIdx AS cartIdx, c.writer AS writer, c.goodsAmount, g.goodsIdx AS goodsIdx, g.goodsTitle AS goodsTitle, FROM myspring.cart c, myspring.goods g WHERE g.goodsIdx = c.goodsIdx AND c.writer = #{writer}
SELECT count(*) AS listCnt FROM goods
SELECT count(*) AS isGoodsExist FROM cart WHERE writer = #{writer} AND goodsIdx = #{goodsIdx}
